property.name: lblInterestForIndiaChina
property.label: Label - Interest for India China
property.default: I'm interested in also applying for

property.name: lblInterestForIndiaChinaHelpText
property.label: Label - Interest for India China Note
property.default: India program places fellows with organizations in India and is open to Indian nationals. The China program places fellows with organizations in China and is open to Chinese nationals

property.name: lblUSRegionPref
property.label: Label - US Region Pref
property.default: Please choose the regions you would be willing to relocate to for the fellowship

property.name: lblUSRegionPrefHelpText
property.label: Help Text - US Region Pref
property.default: Please note, fellows are expected to pay for and organize any relocation associated with the fellowship. Fellows are also expected to pay for housing and living expenses during the fellowship.

property.name: lblUSDriverLicense
property.label: Label - US Driver License
property.default: Do you have a valid US Driver's License?

property.name: lblAccessToVehicle
property.label: Label - Access To Vehicle Heading
property.default: If yes, do you have access to a vehicle this summer or would you be willing to get access to one (e.g. rent)?

property.name: lblSectorPreferenceNote
property.label: Label - Sector Preference Note
property.default: Indicate your top three choices from the dropdown lists

property.name: lblProjectTypePreferenceNote
property.label: Label - Project Type Preference Note
property.default: Indicate your top three Project Type Preferences from the dropdown lists

property.name: lblAvailabilityNote
property.label: Label - Availability Note
property.default: Climate Corps Program requires your full-time commitment for the 8-12 weeks long fellowship project. Please indicate your availability between April-September for a full-time commitment to a Climate Corps fellowship project.

property.name: lblAvailabilityAdditionalDetails
property.label: Label - Availability Additional
property.default: List any additional detail about your availability during the fellowship period

property.name: charsAvailabilityAdditional
property.label: Char Limit - Other Areas of Interest

property.name: charsAreasOfInterestOther
property.label: Char Limit - Other Areas of Interest

property.name: lblRegionalPreferenceChina
property.label: Label - Regional Preference China
property.default: Select regions in China you would be willing to relocate to for the fellowship
